If He withholds His bounties from you, do you have anyone else who could grant you the provisions? The fact is, they hide behind their pride, and their (irrational) aversion (to the truth)
So who (do you think) is better guided? The one crawling on his face groping (to find his way), or the one walking upright along the straight path
Say, "It is He Who brought you into being, and conferred upon you (the faculties of) hearing, sight and reasoning. Seldom do you express gratitude
Say, "It is He Who has spread you across the earth; and (in the end) you would be summoned back to Him
They say, "When will that promise come to be, if you are truthful
Say, "That knowledge lies solely with Allah; in fact I am simply a warner
Actually, the faces of the unbelievers would distort (with horror) when they witness the torment in close proximity. They would be told "(this is the promise), this is what you had called for

Say, "Have you thought it over? Regardless of whether Allah destroys me and my companions, or shows us His mercy, (the question before you should be) who will shelter the unbelievers from the painful punishment
Say, "He is Rehman, (the most Merciful). We believe in Him! And in Him we trust. Very soon, you will find out who has committed the obvious (and the gravest) blunder
Say, "Have you thought it over? Should (all) your (drinking) water sink underground (and disappear), who can supply you with springs and clean running water (to drink)
Nun! (Allah swears by) the pen and whatever they, (the angels), write
(Oh prophet), you are not, by the grace of your Lord, a mad man
In fact, you certainly have a perpetual and ever lasting reward (with your Lord)
Indeed, you certainly bear the highest moral character
Soon you will see, and so shall they
Who is deranged _ (you or they)
Indeed, your Lord knows well who has strayed from His path; and He (also) knows those who are the rightly guided
Do not yield to those who have denied the truth
They would love it if you make concessions (and compromise the truth somewhat). They too, would then give in (some)
And do not obey the contemptible oath-monger
The abusive mudslinger, who throws insults around (all the time)
The one who prohibits the good, trespasses and defiantly indulges in sinful acts
Ignoble and greedy, in short, despised
(He acts that way), because he is wealthy and has (many) children
When Our verses are recited to him, he remarks, "(Legends)! Tales of the earlier folks
Very soon, We will (burn and) brand his snout
Indeed, We have put them through a test, just as We tested the owners of an orchard. They swore to pick its fruit the next morning
They allowed no exception, (They did not say, "If Allah pleases)
So, while they slept, a calamity from their Lord visited that orchard (and destroyed it completely)
By the morning, it looked bare, as if it had already been picked clean
At daybreak they called each other
Proceed to your field early in the morning, if you want to pick the fruit (today)
So they departed, muttering to each other
Today, do not let the poor and the needy enter the orchard and pester you (for alms)
With that resolve, and certain (in their minds) that they had the means (to harvest), they left in the morning
When they saw their orchard, they (failed to recognize it, and) cried out, "We have surely lost our way
No! Rather, we have been deprived
The moderate one among them said, "Did I not tell you? Why did you not chant (your Lord´s) praises
They said, "Exalted is our Lord. In fact, we were the wrongdoers
Then they turned around, and began blaming each other
They said, "Indeed, we had certainly acted arrogantly
Hopefully, our Lord will grant us something better in its place. Of course, we do turn to our Lord for forgiveness
Such is the punishment (in this life), but the torment of the afterlife is far greater, if they only knew
For the righteous, there exist with their Lord the blessings filled gardens
Are We to treat the obedient ones the same as the criminals
What is wrong with you? How do you draw your conclusions
Or did you learn it from your scriptures
That you shall have whatever you prefer
Or, do you hold a binding contract over Us till the day of Resurrection, (guaranteeing) that whatever you order shall be yours
Ask them. Who amongst them can claim that
Or, do they have (other gods as Allah´s) partners (offering them such a guarantee)? Let them produce these partners if they are truthful
They would be asked to prostrate (before Allah) on that day when the reality is laid bare. But (that day), they shall find themselves unable (to prostrate)
Downcast would be their eyes (in shame); disgrace shall overwhelm them. They were asked to prostrate in this life, when they were sound and solid
So let Me handle (all) those who reject this Qur´an. Gradually, We would lead them (into Hell), by means they would seldom perceive
I will let them have a little respite. My scheme is a cinch _ (airtight and foolproof)
Or, do you ask them for a fee (or a reward)? Are they laboring under the burden (of such a demand)
Or, do they have the knowledge of the unseen so they may write (their own fate)
So, wait patiently for your Lord´s decree. Do not act like the man of the fish, (the prophet Jonah), when he called (his Lord), choked with grief
(In the fish he would still be), had the mercy of your Lord not reached him. He was tossed on the bare (and barren) beach _ censured (and chastised)
Eventually, his Lord chose him and placed him among the righteous ones
The unbelievers look at you with aversion (and animosity), and they almost trip you up with their eyes. They hear this reminder, the Qur´an, and say, "He is really a man possessed
Although it is (nothing but) a reminder for the whole world
The Reality
And what is (that inevitable) Reality
What do you understand by the ´Reality´
The ´Samoods´ and the ´Aads´ denied the (impending) calamity of sudden onset _ (the hour of Judgment)
So the Samoods were wiped out by the lightning (and the thunderbolt)
While the ´Aads´ were destroyed by the violent howling winds

For seven hideous days and eight gruesome nights, He let the winds ravage them. (Had you been there), you could see their bodies tossed about (and strewn around), as if they were the hollowed out trunks of the date trees
Do you see any of them around, anymore
The pharaoh, and those before him _ the overturned cities (of Sodom and Gomorrah) _ committed the (very same) crime
They defied the messengers of their Lord, and so He seized (and squeezed) them into a tight grip
Indeed, (oh believers, during the great deluge of Nooh) when the water began to inundate, We carried you (and kept you afloat) aboard a ship
So as to make it a memorable event for you; so that the attentive souls may retain an indelible memory of that event in their (subconscious) mind
As (soon as) the trumpet sounds for the first time
The earth and the mountains would be dislodged and crushed with a single blow
And so, on that day the inevitable (event) would come to pass
Feeble and frail, on that day the sky shall burst asunder
The angels would be present there, at the edge (of the throne). Eight of them would carry your Lord´s throne above them
That shall be the day you are presented before Him (with all your secrets bared); none of your intimate secrets shall remain unexposed
Then, the one who is given his record (of deeds) in his right hand would say, (excitedly to others), "Here, take (a look)! Read the record (of my deeds)
I really did believe that (one day), I would have to face the reckoning
So, he shall have a pleasant and blissful (ever lasting) life
In the exalted (gardens of delight)
With its cluster of fruit (drooping low), within easy reach
(Enjoy)! Eat and drink (and relish your reward), the result of the deeds you had earned in the life gone by
While he, who is given his record (of deeds) in his left hand would (lament and) say, "I wish I had never been given my record
I wish I had never known (the contents of) my record
I wish my death (in the world) had been final (and decisive)
My wealth (and possessions) did not help me
And my (talents and) faculties have (waned and) gone
(The command will sound), "Grab him and tie him down
And roast him over the blazing fire
Then shackle him securely with iron chains, seventy yards long
He did not believe in Allah, the Almighty, the Greatest
Nor did he ever encourage the feeding of the needy (and the hungry)
Today, he has no friends here
And to eat, he only has the filthy discharge from wounds
Which no one except the sinners have to eat
No! Absolutely not! I swear by all that you see
As well as that which you do not
It, (the Qur´an), is the word of the noble messenger
(Certainly)! it is not the word of a poet. Little do you believe
Nor is it the word of a fortuneteller. Seldom do you ponder
It is the revelation from the Lord of the universe
Had he (the prophet) purported (and fabricated) lies about Us
We would have seized him by his right hand
And would have cut off his main vein
(Absolutely) no one among you could have kept Us away from him
It is certainly a reminder for the righteous
Of course We know, that among you are those who disbelieve
Thus, this Qur´an will definitely be the source of anguish for the disbelievers
It is the veritable truth _ (a statement of absolute certainty)
So glorify the name of the Almighty, your Lord
The skeptics ask about the torment that is bound to land
Upon the unbelievers! Nothing can ward it off
(It is) from Allah, the Lord of the means of ascent (to the heavens)
The angels and the spirits rise up towards Him during a day that spans fifty thousand years
So endure (all adversity) with grace and patience
Indeed, they consider the punishment to be far in the future
While We see it close at hand
The sky that day, will be like molten copper
And the mountains like the fluffy tufts of wool
Even the closest friends would fail to inquire about (the welfare of) their close friends
Although, they would see each other! The criminal, that day, would like to escape punishment by offering his own son as ransom
His wife and his brother
And (all) relatives _ (even those) who had sheltered him (through the years)
In fact, (he would be ready to offer as ransom) every single soul on earth, if he could (in return) save himself
No! Of course not! It is a blazing inferno
And it will scald away the scalps (of the unbelievers)
It will summon (by name), all those who turned their backs and ran away (from the truth)
And amassed (wealth), and hoarded it
Indeed, man is created impatient (and fretful)
He (frets and) panics in the face of adversity
And acts niggardly when he encounters good fortune
Except those who perform ´salat´
(Successful are) those who are steadfast (prompt, and punctual) in their ´salat´
Those who accept a due share in their wealth
For people seeking (alms), and for the deprived
(Successful are) those who believe in the Day of Judgment
Those who were fearful of the torment inflicted by their Lord
Indeed, None may feel (wholly) secure and indifferent to the torment of their Lord
(Successful are) those who rein in their sexuality
Except with their spouses _ those whom their right hands possess; because then, they are not blameworthy
While those seeking anything beyond that are really the transgressors
(Successful are) those who discharged their trusts faithfully, and honor their pledges
And when they bear witness, they stand firm (and are truthful)
Those who perform their ´salat´ devotedly and diligently
Such (righteous) ones would be honored in paradise
So what is wrong with the unbelievers? Why do they run towards you
(They are ever so ready to denounce you) in groups, on the right and on the left
Does every man among them aspire to enter the blessings filled paradise
No, of course not! We have created them out of (base) matter that they know (and are familiar with)
Certainly not! I swear by the Lord of the easts and the wests, that We are indeed capable
Of replacing them with (other creations) better than them. We shall certainly not be surpassed
So let them stay engrossed in their idle talks and their games, until they come to face their promised day
That day they would rush out of their graves fast, as if they were hurrying towards their goal
Their eyes shall be down cast (with shame). Humiliation and disgrace shall overwhelm them (completely). They are being promised (just) such a day
Indeed, We sent Nooh towards his people (and said to him), "Warn your people before (it is too late, and) a painful punishment befalls them
He said, "Oh my people, I am obviously a messenger towards you
(With a message) that you should worship Allah (exclusively); you should fear Him, and obey me
He will forgive your sins and grant you respite for a specified time. Indeed, once that time arrives, the decree of Allah cannot be delayed. If you only knew
He said, "My Lord, I have invited my nation (towards the truth) day and night
But my calls have only increased their hatred (for the truth)

In fact, whenever I call them (to say) that You might forgive them, they stick their fingers in their ears. They (hide their faces and) wrap their clothes around them (in defiance). They grew obstinate and became (rude and insulting, and) increasingly arrogant
Indeed, I even preached to them in public
Indeed, I (not only) declared (and conveyed the message) to them in public, (but) I even reasoned with them in private
I said, ´seek forgiveness from your Lord. Indeed, He is Oft-Forgiving!´
He will send abundant rain for you from the sky
He will help you and cause you to increase in wealth and offspring. He will grant you gardens. He will cause rivers to flow (in your land)
What is the matter with you? Why do you not expect (and anticipate) dignity from Allah
He has created you in stages
Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens in tiers
In the heavens, He created the moon to be (a soft) light, (while) He set the sun up as a lamp _ (a source of light)
It is Allah Who (created you from the earth´s elements; as it were, He) caused you to sprout from the earth (as plants)
Later, He will return you to earth, and then He will bring you (back to life) out (of this very earth)
Allah has laid the earth out for you as a wide expanse
So you move about in this world, over highways and mountain passes
Nooh said, "My Lord, they have really disobeyed me; they have followed the ones whose wealth and offspring have merely served to (multiply and) increase their loss
They have hatched a mighty awesome scheme
They said (to their followers), ´Do not ever give up your gods. Never ever abandon (the worship of) Wada, Suwa, Yaguth, and nasr´ _(all names of idols being worshipped)
These idols have led many astray. (Surely), You let (no one but) the evil doers increase (and advance) in misguidance
Because of their sins, they were drowned and then cast into the fire. They did not find any helpers to save them from Allah
Nooh prayed, "My Lord, do not leave any one of them (alive) on (the surface of) the earth
Indeed, if You spare them, they may lead Your servants astray. They will beget only (intransigent) sinners and unbelievers

My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and anyone who enters my home as a believer. (Forgive) the believing men and the believing women, and do not increase the evil doers in anything but doom and destruction
Say, "It has been revealed to me that a (small) group of jinn heard (the Quran) and reported (it to its nation), ´We just heard a wonderful recital.´
It guides towards the right path. We believe in it, and we shall (now) never associate anyone with our Lord
Indeed, He _ Exalted and Majestic as He is _ did not (ever) take a mate or a son
The foolish among us, used to utter atrocious lies about Allah
We thought (and wrongly assumed) that human beings and jinn could not utter false statements about Allah
Some of the human beings used to invoke the support (and protection) of some (individuals among the jinn). (But) the jinn merely increased the (confusion and) disbelief of man
And people thought _ as you did _ that Allah will not resurrect anyone
We scanned (and surveyed) the sky and found it teaming with watchful guards and flaming meteors
Indeed, we used to seek places (in the sky) to sit and eavesdrop (on the angels). But now whoever attempts to eavesdrop finds a flaming meteor lurking around (to strike him)
Of course, we did not know whether a (cosmic) calamity has been planned for those on earth, or that their Lord intends to reveal to them the right path
Among us (jinn), there are some that are righteous, and others that are quite the opposite. We follow diverse (and divergent) paths
We have come to realize that we will never (be able to) evade Allah on earth. Nor can we ever evade Him if we run away (and leave the earth)
In fact, when we heard the guidance, we believed it. Thus, whoever believes in his Lord never needs to worry about his (good) deeds losing their worth. Nor shall he ever fear an injustice

Indeed, some of us (have surrendered and) are obedient, while others have deviated (from the right path). In fact, those accepting Islam (as their way of life) are really the ones seeking the right path
Those who have deviated from the right path would serve as fuel (and firewood) for hell
Had they stood firm upon the way (of Islam), We would (surely) have supplied them with abundant (rain) water
To test them with! The Lord will immerse into an ever worsening torment, all those who turn away from the remembrance of their Lord
The masjids, (the mosques), are for (the worship of) Allah. So do not invoke others along with Allah
When the servant of Allah, (Muhammad, SAW), rose to invoke Him, they (resisted and) almost stifled him with their crowds
Say, "I shall pray (only) to my Lord and I shall not associate anyone with Him
Say, "I really have no power to cause you any harm, nor (to make you follow) the right path
Say, "No one can protect me against Allah. If (I do) not (get an asylum with Him), I will not find a place of refuge (anywhere)
(My mission is nothing) except to convey the revelations of Allah _ His messages. The fire of hell is for the one who disobeys Allah and His messenger. (That one) will stay there for ever
(Let them wait) till they witness that which they have been promised. Very soon, they will find out whose supporters are weaker and fewer in numbers
Say, "I do not know if the promised punishment is (to occur in the) near (future), or if my Lord will set a distant date for it
(Allah is) the Knower of the unseen; He does not divulge His secrets to anyone
Except to whomever He chooses among His messengers. (When He reveals the unseen to a messenger), He appoints (angels as) observers in front of and behind him

In order to monitor how the Messenger conveys the message of his Lord. He (Allah) surrounds (with his Knowledge and Power) everything that exists around them. (He knows everything)! He has counted up every single thing
Oh you, (Muhammad, SAW), bundled up in clothes
(Arise and) stand (in ´salat´) during the night, save a little while
Half (the night), or a little less than that
Or, (make it) a little more (than half); and recite the Qur´an distinctly and in a slow sing-song chant
Indeed, soon We will lay upon you a profound statement, (and entrust you with a momentous mission)
Indeed, during the (pre dawn) hours of the night, the perception is keener and the speech more effective (and clearer)
You have ordinary chores to perform during the day
So, (at night), remember the name of your Lord and worship Him (exclusively) with sincerity and devotion
(He is) the Lord of the East and the West. There is no god but He! So accept Him as your guardian
And patiently endure what they utter, and part company with them in a handsome and polite manner
And, leave Me to handle (all) those who deny (the truth), those (who happen to be) living in peace and comfort. Let them, for a while
For them, We have shackles and the raging fire (and)
The food that chokes, and a painful punishment
(Let them be) then, till that day when the earth and the mountains would rock and reel violently. The mountains would turn into heaps of loosely packed sand
Of course, We have sent a messenger towards you to bear witness against you, just as We sent a messenger towards the pharaoh
But the pharaoh defied the messenger, and so We seized him with virulent consequences
If you defy and disobey, how would you go through (the frightful terror of) the Day (of Judgment), which would turn even the children gray (with horror)
(On that day), the sky will burst asunder; His promise is (simply) bound to be fulfilled
This (Qur´an) is indeed a reminder. (Now), whoever wants, may take the road that leads towards his Lord

Of course, Allah knows that you, and some of those with you, do stand (in ´salat´) close to two-thirds of the night. Sometimes half the night and sometimes close to one-third (of the night). Allah keeps the count of the day and the night (precisely). He knows that you cannot (always) keep time (so accurately). So He has turned to you with kindness and grace. You may recite as much of the Qur´an as you easily can. He knows that (at any given time) some of you would be sick, and others would be travelling in search of Allah´s bounties. Still others would be (engaged in) fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite as much of the Qur´an as you can, establish the ´salat´, pay the ´zakat´ and advance the virtuous loan to Allah. Whatever good deeds you send ahead for yourself are there with Allah. You will receive the rewards for your deeds (on the Day of Judgment), far better and bigger (than your deeds deserve). Seek the forgiveness of Allah, for Allah is oft-Forgiving, the most Merciful
Oh you, wrapped up (in a cloak)
Get up and warn (people)
And announce that your Lord is the Greatest
Cleanse and keep your clothes purified
And keep clear away from filth
Do not seek worldly gains (in return) for favors done
Endure (adversity) with patience, for the sake of your Lord
(Warn everyone that) the day the trumpet sounds
Would truly be a long hard day
Not at all an easy day for the unbelievers
So, let Me handle the one whom I created all alone
And, I granted him wealth (and resources) in abundance
And sons to stand by him
I made life comfortable and easy for him
Yet, he (greedily) desires that I should grant him still more
Of course not! Indeed, he was obstinate (and ardent) in opposing Our verses
Soon, I will impose a dreadful torment upon him
Indeed, he pondered and plotted
Cursed is he, the plot he hatched
Once again, damned is he! What a plot he hatched
Then, he looked around (haughtily)
Frowned, and signaled his displeasure
Finally, he turned back and displayed arrogance
Then said, "It is nothing but (the same old) magic handed down from antiquity
It, (the Qur´an), is merely the word of a mortal
Soon, I will fling him (and roast him) in that scorcher _ (the hell)
And what do you think the scorcher is
It would not spare (anything or anyone), nor would it leave them alone (by finishing them off)
It will (scorch and) shrivel the human flesh
And over that (scorcher) are nineteen (angels standing guard)

We have chosen to appoint the angels as wardens over hell, and We let their number be a trial for the unbelievers. So that, those given the scriptures may believe, and the believers may increase in their belief. Both _ those given the scriptures and the believers _ may not entertain doubts. Yet, those with disease in their hearts, and the unbelievers, would still say, "What does Allah mean by this example?" Thus, Allah leads astray whom He wants, and guides whom He wants. No one knows the forces of Allah except He. This is nothing but a reminder for the mortals
No! (I) swear by the moon
The night, as it retreats
And the dawn as it glows
Indeed, it (hell) is surely one of the mightiest (signs)
A warning for the mortals
(Now), anyone of you who wishes may proceed (towards excellence), or lag behind
Every soul is (mortgaged and) held (as security) against the (evil) deeds it has wrought
Except (the righteous ones), those on the right hand
(They would be) in the paradise; (and) they shall ask
The criminals
What has caused you to end up in this scorcher
They would reply, "We were not among those who established the ´salat´
Nor among those who fed (and cared for) the poor and the destitute
(Instead), we joined those who indulged in idle prattle (against the truth)
And we denied the (coming of the) Day of Judgment
Till the inevitable (death) came upon us
So, the intercession of the mediators did not help them at all
What is the matter with them? They are turning away from the reminder
As if they were startled donkeys
Running away from a lion
In fact, each one of them wants to be handed over his (very own customized) scriptures all spread out
Not ever! The fact is, they do not fear the afterlife
No! In fact, this (Qur´an) is (just) an admonition
(Now) whoever wants, may heed (its warning)
But they will not heed unless Allah so wills. He is Worthy of being feared, and He is the One Who forgives
No, I swear by the day of Resurrection
And no, I swear by the censuring voice of conscience
Does man suppose that We would not (be able to) put his bones (back) together
Indeed, We have the power to (mold and) sculpt (even) his finger tips in perfect proportions
Actually, man (just) wants to keep on sinning
(So) he asks (derisively), "When is the day of resurrection
(It will occur) when the sight becomes dazed (in a stupor)
And the moon turns lightless
And the sun and the moon are made to run into each other
On that day, man will say, "Where is the refuge
Not at all! There is no refuge
The ultimate abode, (the journey´s end), is with your Lord today
That day (each) man will be apprised of everything he sent forward, as well as everything he held back
In fact, man (really) has an insight into his (own) self
Even though he makes up excuses
Do not move your tongue hurriedly (in an attempt) to hasten the (revelation of the) Qur´an
Indeed, it is Our responsibility to have it collected (compiled) and read (as a book)
Therefore, follow the recital (attentively), as We recite the Qur´an to you
It is (also) Our responsibility to explain to you its meaning
No (oh people), in fact you (just) love the transient life (of this world)
While you forsake the afterlife
That day, some faces would be radiant
Looking at their Lord (in anticipation)
While (some) faces that day, would be gloomy and sullen
Convinced that a cataclysmic catastrophe would soon strike them
No! In fact when the soul (heaves up and) reaches the collar bone (as it exits the body)
And (after) it has been asked, "Any miracle worker? (Can anyone help)
And the (dying) man knows that it is farewell
Then, the shin will twine around its twin _ (the other shin)
And events will then progress towards your Lord
So, he refused to affirm, and did not perform the ´salat´
Instead, he rejected the truth and turned away
Then vainly and haughtily, he walked back to his family
Misery is for you. Misery
Yes, of course! Misery is for you. Misery
Did man think that he would be left unchecked, (and never be called to account)
Was he not (just) an ejected drop of semen
Then, he became a clot, and He (Allah) gave him the form and proportions
And from the clot, He created two sexes _ male and female
Isn´t such (a Mighty) being, (the Almighty), capable of bringing the dead back to life
Was there (ever) a period of time when man was not worth a mention
We have certainly created man from a drop of mixed semen, (in order) to test him. Therefore, We made him capable of hearing and seeing
Indeed, We (also) showed man the (right) path. (Now), he may either (accept and) be grateful, or reject (and be ungrateful)
We have certainly prepared chains, shackles and the blazing fire for the unbelievers
While the righteous ones would get to drink from cups filled with camphor flavored wine
(Gushing from) the springs. The servants of Allah will drink right from it. They would channel the springs with ease
(Because they) fulfill (their) vows, and fear the day of widespread disaster
And for the sake of His love, they feed the poor (and needy), the orphans and the captives
(They say), "For the sake of Allah, we feed you. We do not expect anything from you in return, not even thanks
In fact, we fear a dreary day of affliction from our Lord, a very long day (indeed)
But, Allah will protect them from the evil (and torture) of such a day; He would grant them the glow of beauty and joy
The paradise _ and (a wardrobe of) fine silk (garments) _ would be their reward for what they patiently endured
In the paradise, they would recline (and relax) on couches. (There), they shall neither be troubled by the heat of the sun, nor by the excessive biting cold
The shades of paradise would (shield them and) cover them all around. The cluster of fruit would droop low, within easy reach
Silver goblets, and clear crystal glasses would be circulated among them
Goblets made of crystal clear silver would be filled to measure, as per their wishes
In paradise, they would be given a cup (of wine) to drink; it would have the flavor of ginger
The spring (of wine) in paradise is called ´The salsabeel´
Youthful lads, staying young forever, would (go around and) wait on them. (So handsome), you would take them for scattered pearls when you see them
In the paradise, you will find (the idyllic bliss and) blessings everywhere; splendors of the great empire
They will wear green garments made of fine silk and rich brocade. They shall don silver (arm bands and) bracelets as adornments. Their Lord will give them a pure (refreshing) drink
(They shall hear), "This is really your reward. Your efforts (in life) have found acceptance (and borne fruit in the afterlife)
Indeed, it is We Who revealed to you the Qur´an in stages, a little at a time
Therefore, submit to the commands of your Lord, patiently. And do not obey the sinners, the unbelievers among them
And remember your Lord´s name, each morning and evening
Prostrate before Him during part of the night. Chant His praises during the long hours of the night
In fact, the unbelievers love the present (transient) life, the one easy to earn (and attain), while they put behind (and out of their mind), the remembrance of a grievous onerous day
It is We Who created them. We gave them their strength and vigor. Whenever We wish, We can replace them all together. We can easily bring in their place others like them
Indeed, this (Qur´an) is a reminder! (Now), whoever wishes may follow the path (that leads) to his Lord
But you cannot will anything, unless Allah wills it so. Indeed, Allah is all-Knowing, all-Wise
He ushers into His mercy whomever He wills. For the evil doers, He has prepared a painful punishment
(I swear by the wind) that is sent in waves, and buffets gently
And the violent wind that raises storms
Then, scatters things around
And splits them asunder
And instills (in man) the remembrance (of Allah)
As a plea, and as a warning
What you are being promised, (the Day of Decision), will very surely occur
(It will occur) when the stars lose their luster
The sky bursts asunder
The mountains (blow up and) crumble
And when all the messengers are summoned (to bear witness)
Until what day has it been put off
Till the Day of Decision
And what do you suppose is the Day of Decision
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
Did We not wipe out the unbelievers of earlier times
We will make (the unbelievers of) the later generations follow (the same fate as that of) the earlier ones
This is what We do to the criminals
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
Did We not create you from a (tiny) drop of filthy fluid
Which We lodged in a secure and stable setting
For a known period
This is what We destined! How very excellent is Our destiny
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
Did We not appoint the earth to accommodate
The living, and the dead
And on the earth, We placed the high mountains; and We gave you sweet water to drink
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
(They would be told), "Proceed now and enter (hell), the very thing you used to deny (so vehemently)
Proceed under the three-pronged shadow
It neither provides the cool shade, nor lends protection against the (fierce) flames
Indeed, it will hurl sparks as tall as a (lofty) palace
Which would look like yellow camels
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
Nothing will they say that day
Nor would they be allowed to offer excuses (and explanations)
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
This is the Day of Decision. (Today) We have assembled all of you together, along with (all) the earlier generations
If you have a trick left (up your sleeves), play it now! Outwit Me
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
The pious ones (that day) would be amidst cool shades, fountains
And fruits of their choice
Eat and drink, and relish your rewards! (It is yours) in return for what you used to do
This is really how We reward the righteous
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
(Oh unbelievers)! Eat and enjoy (your possessions) just a little while longer. Indeed, you are the criminals
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
When asked to kneel (before their Lord), they refused
Misery that day is for those who (dispute and) deny (the truth)
So, after this (Qur´an), is there any other discourse they can (accept and) believe
What are they asking each other about
The awesome news (of the afterlife)
About which they have (many doubts, discords and) disagreements
By no means! They shall soon find out
Indeed! They shall soon find out
Have We not laid out the earth as a cradle
And (nailed) the Mountains (down) as pegs
We created you all in pairs
We created sleep for you to rest (and rejuvenate)
We made the night (dark as) a cloak (that conceals and covers)
And We made the day (bright) for (you to earn your) livelihood
And We arranged seven (solid and) strong (cosmic systems) over you
And We set up (the sun as) a bright and blazing lamp
And We sent down plenty of water from the rain clouds
To produce with it, the grains and the plants
And lush and luxurious gardens
Certainly! The Day of Decision is a (destined and) definite day
You will all emerge in droves on the day the trumpet sounds
And the heavens would be (uncovered and) opened, as if it had (many wide-open) gates
And the mountains would be (dislodged and) set in motion; they would look like a mirage, (an illusion)
Hell, in fact, lies in ambush
For the transgressors, it will become the (abiding) abode
In it, they will stay for a long stretch of time
There they will not ever taste, much less drink, anything cool
(They will drink) only boiling-hot water, and pus (from wounds)
An apt and apposite outcome
Indeed, never did they anticipate a reckoning
And falsely did they oppose Our verses (and signs)
We have recorded every single thing in a book
Now taste (the consequences of your deeds)! Suffering is all We shall ever bestow _ and increase _ upon you
The triumphant finale shall belong to the pious
The orchards and the vineyards
And blossoming buxom belle _ (the well matched maidens) _ as mates
And the brimful cups (of wine)
Inane nonsense talk and (false) gossip, they shall not hear in paradise
Compensation from your Lord, a bountiful and generous grant
Before Rehman _ the Lord of the heavens and the earth, and everything between them _ they won´t dare to speak
On that day, all souls and all angels shall stand (before Him) in rows. No one shall dare to speak unless Rehman grants permission, and on condition that he will speak only what is proper
Such is the day of the truth! (It is sure to arrive). Now, whoever wishes may seek the course towards his Lord
We have certainly warned you of the (imminent and) impending doom. On that day, man would look at the deeds he had sent ahead; he would say, "Alas! if I were only dust
(I swear by the angels) _ those who (violently) wrench out (the souls of the unbelievers)
And those who (gently) draw out (the souls of the believers)
Those who swiftly glide along (in the universe)
Those who rush to carry out
And execute the commands (of the Lord)
That day, (the Day of Decision), a violent jolt will rock (the earth)
And another (jolt) will (soon) follow
That day, hearts would pound (in panic)
And eyes would drift downward (with dread)
They are saying, "What? Would we really be restored back to our former (state of) existence
Even after we are (just) crumbling bones
They say, "Such a (revival and) recurrence is hence a losing proposition
(In fact), it will just take a single rebuke
And at once they will appear on the surface
Has the story of Musa reached you
His Lord summoned him to the holy valley of ´Tuwa´
(And said), "Go to the pharaoh, he is really rebellious
And ask him, "Are you willing to accept purity
(If so), I will guide you towards your Lord; fear Him
And Musa showed him the great sign
But the pharaoh denied and disobeyed
And turned back to hatch a scheme
Then he assembled (his cronies) and announced
He said, "I am your Lord, the most high
So, (as a punishment), Allah turned him into an example in the afterlife, as well as in this life
Of course, there is a lesson in it for all who fear (the reckoning)
(Oh mankind)! Are you the harder to create, or is it the heavens which He built
He raised its vault high, and gave it balance
He imbued the night with darkness, and drew out its morning (glow)
And after that, He spread out the earth
He drafted off its water and produced the fodder
And He fixed the mountains firmly
(All that) for your needs, and those of your livestock
When that most grievous disaster befalls
Man, that day, shall recall all he ever (stood and) strove for
And the hell shall (loom large, and) be made visible to all
Anyone who transgressed (and rebelled)
And preferred the life of this world (to the afterlife)
Would really have hell for a home
While anyone who feared having to stand before his Lord (for a reckoning), and guarded himself against (the base and banal) desires
Would certainly have the paradise for a home
(Oh prophet), they ask you about the hour (of Judgment), "When will that (hour) come to pass
It is not for you to forecast the (actual) date (of its occurrence)
That (knowledge) rests solely with your Lord
You are there to warn anyone who fears (that day)
When they see that day, it will actually be like they have lived (in this world) for just one morning, or a single afternoon
He frowned and turned his face away
Because a blind man came to him (and interrupted him)
You don´t really know! Perhaps he would (shed his disbelief, and) grow in faith
He might heed (the warning); perhaps the reminder would benefit him
(Instead), the one who displays indifference
You attend to
It is not your failing if he fails to cleanse (himself of disbelief)
But, from the one who seeks you eagerly
And fears (Allah)
You divert your attention away
No, in fact this _ (the Qur´an) _ is a reminder
Anyone who cares, may heed
(It is inscribed) in the honored record
Sublime and held in high esteem
Set down by scribes
Noble and virtuous
Man be damned! How ungrateful is he
What was it, from which He created man
From semen! He created man, then assigned his nature
Then, He made the path (of righteousness) easy for him
Then He gave him death, and sent him to his grave
And then He will, whenever He wills, bring him back to life
No! Man did not do what Allah commanded him to do
Let man look at (the source of) his food
(To produce his food), We pour down plenty of water
(Then) We split the ground and lay it open
And out of it, We cause the grain to sprout
And the grapes and vegetables
The olives and dates
Woodland with dense foliage
And the fruits and fodder
Such is your, and your livestock´s sustenance
When the deafening blare (of the trumpet) sounds
Man will run away from his brother that day
And his mother and father
And his wife and son
Everyone that day would have far too many concerns (of his own), to care about others
Some faces that day, would glow
(With) happiness and joyful ecstasy
While some faces that day would be covered with (grim and grimy) shades
And overwhelmed by darkness
Such would be the unbelievers, the obstinate (sinners)
When the sun (and the solar system) is wrapped up
And the stars are rendered dim and dusty
And the mountains are (dislodged and) set in motion
And the pregnant camel is left unattended (by its owner)
And the beasts are herded up
And oceans boil and brim over
(That would be the day) when souls would rejoin their bodies
And the infant girl who was buried alive, would be asked
What was her sin? Why was she killed
When the record (of deeds) is laid open
And the sky is stripped bare
And the hellfire is set ablaze
And the paradise is brought closer
(That day), each soul shall learn what (deeds) it has brought along
No, (I swear) by the planets
And the stars that rise and set
And the night as it departs
And the dawn that breathes (anew)
Of course, this (Qur´an) is really the word brought by the noble messenger _ (the angel, Gibrael)
The one who has power and high rank with the Lord of the throne
(The one who is) obeyed, and is furthermore, trustworthy
(Oh people)! your companion is not crazy
He most definitely saw (the angel, Gibrael) on the clear horizon
And he is not stingy about (disclosing the knowledge of) the unseen
It is not the word of the cursed Shaitan
So, where to, are you headed
This is not anything other than the reminder for the entire world
For every single one of you, anyone who wishes to walk upright along the straight path
But the wishes of any of you do not matter, unless Allah, the Lord of the universe, wills it too
When the sky is split asunder
And the stars are strewn around
And the oceans spill forth
And the graves are overturned (and emptied)
(That is the day when) every soul would learn everything it did, that which it sent ahead, and that which it left behind
(Oh people)! What has lured you away from your Lord, the most Eminent, the Generous
The One Who created you, fashioned you, and gave you (the right) proportions
In whatever form He willed, He brought you into being
No! Rather, you deny the (day of) reward and punishment
Indeed, to watch over you (and record) are
The noble scribes, (the angels)
They know everything you do
Of course, the pious would be in bliss
And the wicked would surely be in hellfire
They shall join it on the Day of Judgment
And (thereafter) they shall never (be allowed to) remain absent from it
What can make you grasp the reality of the Day of Judgment
(Think) again! What can make you grasp the reality of the Day of Judgment
That day, no soul shall have any power to do anything at all for anyone else. That day, the command will belong to Allah (exclusively)
Woe to those who weigh and measure less
Those who insist upon receiving the full measure, when they are the ones receiving
But when they measure and weigh for others, they (short change and) give less than due
Do such people not think that they are going to be resurrected
On an awesome day
That day, all mankind shall stand before the Lord of the universe
Of course not! The book of deeds of the wicked ones is (preserved) in the "Sijjin" _ (the vault)
And how would you know what ´Sijjin´ is
(It is) a book inscribed
Misery that day is for those who belie (the truth)
Those who dispute (and refute) the Day of Judgment
No one disputes it except all the sinful obstinate transgressors
When Our verses are recited to them they say, "Fables of the earlier people
Of course not! Rather, all (the filth) they have earned has rusted and encrusted their hearts
Of course not! In fact, on that day they would be shut out from the Mercy of their Lord
Then, they shall burn in hell
And they would be told, "This is precisely what you used to deny
While the record of deeds of the virtuous is (preserved) in the ´Illiyeen´ _ (the register of the exalted)
And how would you know what ´Illiyeen´ is
(It is) a book inscribed
Those nearest (to Allah, the angels) will attest to it
The righteous ones would be in bliss
Seated on thrones, looking on
You would notice a blissful radiance on their faces
To drink, they would be given the sealed wine, the choicest and the purest
Musk shall be its seal! Those wishing to excel, should excel at this
Its flavor and essence shall consist of ´Tasneem´
A spring! Those closest (to Allah, the righteous ones) would drink from (this spring)
In fact the criminals, the unbelievers, used to laugh at those who believed
As they passed by the believers, they would wink at each other (jokingly)
And when they returned to their family, they returned jesting (and grinning)
Whenever they saw the believers, they said, "These are the people gone astray
The unbelievers were not sent as guardians over the believers
So today, it is the believers´ turn to laugh at the unbelievers
(The believers would be sitting) on elevated thrones, looking on
Now, have the unbelievers not been paid in full for what they did
When the sky splits apart
And heeds its Lord´s command, as it truly must
When the earth distends
Casts off its contents, and becomes bare and blank
It will heed its Lord´s command, as it truly must
Oh man! Indeed, you are steadily advancing towards your Lord. You shall meet Him
Then, the one who is given his record (of deeds) in his right (hand)
